discussion.title: Update version of PySr
discussion.body:
Hi,
I want to update the PySr package. I went through all the installation steps from scratch. For example, I update Julia and then PySr. But it seems that the old version is still running.
I am wondering if there is any straightforward way to update PySr.
Thanks

nodes.body:
More info needed: 
- Are you using pip or conda?
- What did you try to update it?
- How did you install Julia
